statusLine.command: input=$(cat); dir=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir'); model=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.model.display_name'); used=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.context_window.used_percentage // empty'); if [ -n "$used" ]; then printf "%s | Context: %.1f%% used | %s" "$dir" "$used" "$model"; else printf "%s | %s" "$dir" "$model"; fi
